mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.member_cardno AS "memberCardno", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.amount AS "amount", a.balance AS "balance", a.voucher AS "voucher", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.site_id AS "siteId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", s.site_name AS "siteInfo.siteName"
LEFT JOIN luxclub_site_info s ON s.id = a.site_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO luxclub_wallet_fee_record( member_cardno, fee_type, amount, balance, voucher, order_code, site_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{memberCardno}, #{feeType}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{voucher}, #{orderCode}, #{siteId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE luxclub_wallet_fee_record SET member_cardno = #{memberCardno}, fee_type = #{feeType}, amount = #{amount}, balance = #{balance}, order_code = #{orderCode}, site_id = #{siteId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.id AS "feeId", a.member_cardno AS "cardno", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.amount AS "feeMoney", s.id AS "siteId", IFNULL(s.site_name,'私人定制') AS "siteName", b.id as orderId from luxclub_wallet_fee_record a left join luxclub_order b on a.order_code=b.order_code left join luxclub_site_info s on b.reserve_site_id=s.id where a.member_cardno = #{cardno} and a.fee_type in (${feeType}) and a.del_flag = 0 order by a.create_date desc limit #{startNumber}, #{endNumber}

select a.id AS "feeId", a.member_cardno AS "cardno", a.order_code AS "orderCode", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.fee_type AS "feeType", a.amount AS "feeMoney", s.id AS "siteId", s.site_name AS "siteName", o.create_date AS "orderTime", o.pay_way AS "payModel", o.id as "orderId" from luxclub_wallet_fee_record a left join luxclub_order o on o.order_code = a.order_code left join luxclub_site_info s on a.site_id=s.id where a.id = #{feeId} and a.del_flag = 0
